name: A.N.C. - AssortedNoiseCollection
description:
Did you ever wonder about what the little creature in your noise canceling headphones is actually doing? Us neither, nonetheless we present you “A.N.C.”, the Noise-Cancelling-Game! Your task is to modify the sound waves to cancel the noise.

This game was created in the summer edition 2022 of the Semester Game Jam at the TechnicalU Munich. The theme was “override”. 

Have fun!

If the song stops, please restart the game - the song does not loop in the current version.
